name: Mai
title: The Fire Dancer
subtitle: A skilled kunoichi who combines graceful movements with devastating fire techniques
lore: A master of the Shiranui style ninjutsu, Mai is a powerful kunoichi who infuses her martial arts with pyrokinetic abilities. Her graceful movements and control over fire make her a formidable opponent, while her fans serve as both elegant props and deadly weapons. Despite her playful demeanor, Mai is a dedicated warrior who takes her ninja training seriously.

passive.name: Burn
passive.description: Mai gains 1 stack for each ability hit and basic attack. With 1 or more stacks, Mai's basic attacks summon Fire dealing [100% AP] damage. Each stack grants [15/25/50 AP] and lasts for 15s. Passive basic attacks don't generate Burn stacks.

Q.name: Tatzosen
Q.description: Mai throws a fan in the target direction, dealing [50/85/135/190/250 + AP] damage and slowing enemies by [25%] for 3s.

W.name: Blazing Aura
W.description: Mai surrounds herself with an aura for 2s, blocking all damage and pushing enemies away.

E.name: Fire Leap
E.description: Costs 3 passive stacks. Mai can dash in any direction. After dashing, Mai gains [20%] movement speed for 3s (Stackable).

R.name: Spirit Fire
R.description: For 8s, Mai's basic attacks trigger "Burn" without consuming stacks and she gains [0.5/0.8/1.0 AS].

1.name: Extended Burn
1.description: Increase passive stack duration by 5s and grant an additional 5 AP per stack.

1.name: Enhanced Fan
1.description: Tatzosen slows enemies by an additional 10%, and its cooldown is reduced by 1s on hit.

1.name: Protective Leap
1.description: Fire Leap grants 20% magic shield for 3s, and it's stackable.

5.name: Burning Aura
5.description: Blazing Aura burns enemies for [50% AP] magic damage over 3s.

5.name: Piercing Fan
5.description: Tatzosen pierces through 2 additional enemies, dealing 15% less damage per target.

5.name: Swift Flames
5.description: Fire Leap grants 10% attack speed for 3s after each dash.

10.name: Enhanced Spirit
10.description: Spirit Fire increases attack range by 20% and Burn damage by 50%.

10.name: Extended Spirit
10.description: Spirit Fire lasts 2s longer and grants additional 0.4 AS.

15.name: Healing Leap
15.description: Fire Leap heals for 5% maximum HP over 3s.

15.name: Fan Empowerment
15.description: Tatzosen empowers next basic attack to deal 250 bonus damage.

15.name: Protective Aura
15.description: Blazing Aura grants [10% MAXHP] shield for 2s.

20.name: Spirit Mastery
20.description: Basic attacks during Spirit Fire reduce its cooldown by 3s.

20.name: Enhanced Aura
20.description: Blazing Aura radius increased by 20% and stuns enemies for 0.5s.

20.name: Endless Leap
20.description: Fire Leap doesn't consume Burn stacks and gains 2 charges with 6s cooldown.

weaknesses: Vulnerable when abilities are on cooldown
